getExcessCollateral((address[],address[].details: return amount is denominated in the collateral asset for the oToken in the vault, or the collateral asset in the vault

params._vault: theoretical vault that needs to be checked
params._vaultType: vault type (0 for spread/max loss, 1 for naked margin)

returns._0: excessCollateral the amount by which the margin is above or below the required amount
returns._1: isExcess True if there is excess margin in the vault, False if there is a deficit of margin in the vault if True, collateral can be taken out from the vault, if False, additional collateral needs to be added to vault

returns._0: how much collateral can be taken out by 1 otoken unit, scaled by 1e8, or how much collateral can be taken out for 1 (1e8) oToken

params._vault: theoretical vault that needs to be checked

returns._0: the vault collateral amount, and marginRequired the minimal amount of collateral needed in a vault, scaled to 1e27
collateral required for a naked margin vault, in collateral asset decimals

isLiquidatable((address[],address[],addr.details: if the vault is of type 0, the function will revert

params._vaultLatestUpdate: vault latest update (timestamp when latest vault state change happened)
params._vaultType: vault type (0 for max loss/spread and 1 for naked margin vault)

returns._0: isLiquidatable, true if vault is undercollateralized, liquidation price and collateral dust amount

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCollateralCap(address,uint256).details: can only be called by owner

params._cap: cap amount, should be scaled by collateral asset decimals

setCollateralDust(address,uint256).details: can only be called by owner

params._dust: dust amount, should be scaled by collateral asset decimals

setOracleDeviation(uint256).details: can only be called by owner

setSpotShock(address,address,address,boo.details: can only be called by owner

setUpperBoundValues(address,address,addr.details: can only be called by owner

params._timesToExpiry: array of times to expiry timestamp

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateUpperBoundValue(address,address,ad.details: can only be called by owner

BASE.details: decimals used by strike price and oracle price

SCALING_FACTOR.details: decimals option upper bound value, spot shock and oracle deviation

cap.details: mapping to store cap amount per options collateral asset (scaled by collateral asset decimals)

dust.details: mapping to store dust amount per option collateral asset (scaled by collateral asset decimals)

maxPriceAtTimeToExpiry.details: mapping to store option upper bound value at specific time to expiry for a given product (1e27)

spotShock.details: mapping to store shock value for spot price of a given product (1e27)

timesToExpiryForProduct.details: mapping to store array of time to expiry for a given product

getCollateralCap(address).notice: get cap amount for collateral asset

getCollateralDust(address).notice: get dust amount for collateral asset

getExcessCollateral((address[],address[].notice: returns the amount of collateral that can be removed from an actual or a theoretical vault

getExpiredPayoutRate(address).notice: return the cash value of an expired oToken, denominated in collateral

getMarginRequired((address[],address[],a.notice: calculate required collateral margin for a vault

getMaxPrice(address,address,address,bool.notice: get option upper bound value for specific time to expiry

getNakedMarginRequired(address,address,a.notice: return the collateral required for naked margin vault, in collateral asset decimals

getTimesToExpiry(address,address,address.notice: get times to expiry for a specific product

isLiquidatable((address[],address[],addr.notice: check if a specific vault is undercollateralized at a specific chainlink round

setCollateralCap(address,uint256).notice: set cap amount for collateral asset used in naked margin

setCollateralDust(address,uint256).notice: set dust amount for collateral asset

setSpotShock(address,address,address,boo.notice: set spot shock value, scaled to 1e27

updateUpperBoundValue(address,address,ad.notice: set option upper bound value for specific time to expiry (1e27)

userdoc.notice: Calculator module that checks if a given vault is valid, calculates margin requirements, and settlement proceeds
